rules.name: myRule_1
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 7 OR 8) AND 6
rules.label: ShellEmailSentToNonClientInCase

rules.name: myRule_4
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7
rules.label: CCSEmailSentToNonClientInCase

rules.name: myRule_7
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: ShellNonClientEmailReceivedInCase

value.stringValue: AND( NOT(CONTAINS([EmailMessage].ToAddress, '@fleetcor' )), NOT(CONTAINS([EmailMessage].ToAddress, '@shell.' )), NOT(CONTAINS([EmailMessage].ToAddress, '@ccs.' )), NOT(CONTAINS([EmailMessage].ToAddress, '@uta.' )), [EmailMessage].Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Support', NOT([EmailMessage].Incoming), ISPICKVAL([EmailMessage].Status, '3') )

AND( NOT(CONTAINS([EmailMessage].ToAddress, '@fleetcor' )), NOT(CONTAINS([EmailMessage].ToAddress, '@ccs.' )), NOT(CONTAINS([EmailMessage].ToAddress, '@uta.' )), [EmailMessage].Parent.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Support_CCS', NOT([EmailMessage].Incoming), ISPICKVAL([EmailMessage].Status, '3') )
